Package cz.zcu.kiv.multiclouddesktop.action

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AboutAction
    cz.zcu.kiv.multiclouddesktop.action/AboutAction.java

    Action for displaying information about the application.
    AddAccountAction
    cz.zcu.kiv.multiclouddesktop.action/AddAccountAction.java

    Action for adding new user account.
    AuthorizeAction
    cz.zcu.kiv.multiclouddesktop.action/AuthorizeAction.java

    Action for authorizing an account.
    CloudAction
    cz.zcu.kiv.multiclouddesktop.action/CloudAction.java

    Generic template for any action that requires a reference to parent frame.
    CopyAction
    cz.zcu.kiv.multiclouddesktop.action/CopyAction.java

    Action for saving selected file for the copy operation.
    CreateFolderAction
    cz.zcu.kiv.multiclouddesktop.action/CreateFolderAction.java

    Action for creating a new folder.
    CutAction
    cz.zcu.kiv.multiclouddesktop.action/CutAction.java

    Action for saving selected file for the move operation.
    DeleteAction
    cz.zcu.kiv.multiclouddesktop.action/DeleteAction.java

    Action for deleting selected file or folder.
    DownloadAction
    cz.zcu.kiv.multiclouddesktop.action/DownloadAction.java

    Action for downloading a file.
    ExitAction
    cz.zcu.kiv.multiclouddesktop.action/ExitAction.java

    Action for terminating the application.
    FindAction
    cz.zcu.kiv.multiclouddesktop.action/FindAction.java

    Action for searching for folders and files.
    ChecksumAction
    cz.zcu.kiv.multiclouddesktop.action/ChecksumAction.java

    Action for computing checksum of a remote file.
    InformationAction
    cz.zcu.kiv.multiclouddesktop.action/InformationAction.java

    Action for displaying information about the user of an account.
    MultiDownloadAction
    cz.zcu.kiv.multiclouddesktop.action/MultiDownloadAction.java

    Action for downloading file from multiple sources.
    MultiUploadAction
    cz.zcu.kiv.multiclouddesktop.action/MultiUploadAction.java

    Action for uploading a file to multiple destinations.
    PasteAction
    cz.zcu.kiv.multiclouddesktop.action/PasteAction.java

    Action for saving selected file for the paste operation.
    PreferencesAction
    cz.zcu.kiv.multiclouddesktop.action/PreferencesAction.java

    Action for setting up the application.
    PropertiesAction
    cz.zcu.kiv.multiclouddesktop.action/PropertiesAction.java

    Action for displaying file or folder information.
    QuotaAction
    cz.zcu.kiv.multiclouddesktop.action/QuotaAction.java

    Action for displaying the quota of the user account.
    RefreshAction
    cz.zcu.kiv.multiclouddesktop.action/RefreshAction.java

    Action for refreshing the user account and the list of current folder.
    RemoveAccountAction
    cz.zcu.kiv.multiclouddesktop.action/RemoveAccountAction.java

    Action for removing an account.
    RenameAccountAction
    cz.zcu.kiv.multiclouddesktop.action/RenameAccountAction.java

    Action for renaming an account.
    RenameAction
    cz.zcu.kiv.multiclouddesktop.action/RenameAction.java

    Action for renaming file or folder.
    SynchronizeAction
    cz.zcu.kiv.multiclouddesktop.action/SynchronizeAction.java

    Action for synchronizing content of local folder with remote storages.
    UploadAction
    cz.zcu.kiv.multiclouddesktop.action/UploadAction.java

    Action for uploading a file to the cloud storage.
